text: Alison T. Limerick (born 1959, Stepney) is a British singer-songwriter. She had success in the 1990s with the song "Where Love Lives", which was her solo debut and a number 3 hit on the U.S. Hot Dance Club Play in 1991. ==Related pages== *Ottawan *Tavares (group) *Mel and Kim *Tracy Spencer *Radiorama ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:British singer-songwriters
title: Alison Limerick
